content.body: Thanks for the offer Eemili. I don't think our company permits Airbnb or sharing so I'm still wondering whether to go for the nearby hotel or downtown.  Has anyone selected so far?

content.body: I went for the embassy suites walking distance from service now. At a minimum this limits my daily travel to and from the event. I expect to use Lyft to get around to do other stuff!
there was also a big outdoor mall nearby with a lot of dinner options that I expect I'll take advantage of

Love it when corporate travel policies require you to waste money.
